Package com.cafean.rpc

Class AbstractRPCConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.rpc.AbstractRPCConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallbackNotifier, RPCRequester, RPCResponder
    public abstract class AbstractRPCConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for requesters and responders that handles the process of reading and writing bare PibBlock instances to and from data streams. This class's methods do not address protocol, sequencing, etc. These methods should be used within protocol aware code when reading or writing a block is appropriate.
    See Also:
    RPCRequester, RPCResponder

      • getParent

        public RPCManager getParent()
        Retrieves the RPCManager that created this connection. The returned manager will remain the same even after this connection has been shutdown or destroyed.

      • getCreationTime

        public long getCreationTime()
        Returns the creation time of this connection in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        System.currentTimeMillis()

      • getLastActive

        public long getLastActive()
        Returns either the creation time or the last time (in milliseconds) that transmitBlock(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock, java.io.DataOutputStream) or recieveBlock(java.io.DataInputStream) was called for this connection. This is intended for use in determining whether a given connection is idle for book keeping purposes.
        See Also:
        System.currentTimeMillis(), getCreationTime()

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        returns true if this connection is currently active

      • getIoPackage

        public java.lang.String getIoPackage()

      • setDebug

        public void setDebug​(boolean debug)

      • isDebug

        public boolean isDebug()

      • getVersion

        public Version getVersion()
        Returns a Version instance describing the current version of the application using this RPC connection. This base implementation returns the current CAFEAN version from Version.getCurrent().
